entry.title: Thursday: Snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning. Snow beginning this afternoon then changing to rain later this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 3. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Thursday 05 May 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow this evening and ending after midnight then mainly cloudy. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Thursday 05 May 2016

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow and local blowing snow beginning in the morning. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 60 gusting to 80 in the afternoon. High minus 3. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Thursday 05 May 2016
